attributes.action: Send Dog Mess fiends Catapulting into the North Sea
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of society's ills can be traced to the inconsiderate behaviour of dog owners towards their neighbours.  I propose some sort of act of horrific public vengeance, like catapulting them into the north sea.  I am willing to compromise on the catapult, but reckon Sky could film it, you know like victimcam.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
